data.title: Randy Quaid
data.text:
AKA Randall Rudy Quaid

Born: 1-Oct-1950

Birthplace: Houston, TX

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Parents

Younger, plumper, and less successful brother of actor Dennis Quaid. Best known for supporting roles in some terrific movies like The Last Picture Show and Paper Moon, and more recently, for a series of arrests for petty crimes.

Father: William Quaid ("Buddy", electrician, d. 1987, heart attack)

Mother: Nita Quaid (real estate agent)

Brother: Dennis Quaid (actor, b. 9-Apr-1954)

Brother: Buddy Quaid (half-brother, actor, b. 26-Nov-1974)

Wife: (div., one daughter)

Wife: Evzenya Motolanez ("Evi", m. 1989)

High School: Bellaire Senior High School, Bellaire, TX

University: University of Houston

Endorsement of KFC Voice of animated Colonel Sanders

Golden Globe 1988 Best Actor in a Miniseries or Telefilm, LBJ: The Early Years

Hollywood Walk of Fame

Bankruptcy Jan-2000

Burglary arrested Marfa, TX (24-Sep-2009); charge dismissed

Conspiracy arrested Marfa, TX (24-Sep-2009); charge dismissed

Fraud defrauding an innkeeper, arrested Marfa, TX (24-Sep-2009); charge dismissed

Failure to Appear Santa Barbara, CA (12-Apr-2010)

Failure to Appear Santa Barbara, CA (13-Apr-2010)

Burglary arrested Santa Barbara, CA (18-Sep-2010)

Failure to Appear Santa Barbara, CA (18-Oct-2010)

Failure to Appear Highgate Springs, VT (arrested, 9-Oct-2015)
